description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Race your avatar across 8 themed tracks against 7 other cars, including up to 3 of your friends. Use the power ups to help you by taking out as many of them as you can! There are tons of extras: Grand Prix mode, 1-player Time Trials, test drives, "insane" power ups, mirror and reverse mode, track records, ghost cars and many more. 4-player splitscreen with insane power ups has to be tried!
